privacy.title: Zero-Upload Policy
privacy.desc: We process everything inside your browser's RAM. Your files never touch our servers, ensuring 100% privacy and legal compliance.

about.title: About Edit-All
about.subtitle: We are on a mission to bring professional-grade audio editing tools to everyone, directly in the browser, with 100% privacy and zero cost.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.p1: Edit-All was born out of a simple frustration: Why does editing a simple audio loop or merging two tracks require either a massive software installation or uploading private files to a mysterious server?
philosophy.p2: We believe that the best creative tools are the ones that are always available, lightning fast, and respect your data. By leveraging the latest in WebAssembly technology, we've moved the 'engine' into your browser, so your files never leave your computer.

wasm.title: WebAssembly Processing
wasm.desc: We use a specialized build of FFmpeg compiled to WebAssembly. This allows your CPU to process audio data at high speeds without needing any server-side computing.

memory.title: In-Memory Storage
memory.desc: When you 'upload' a file, it is read into your browser's virtual memory (RAM). It exists there only as long as the tab is open. We never see your data.

free.title: Open & Free
free.desc: The tools are free to use. We rely on community support and non-intrusive ads to keep the lights on, ensuring that everyone has access to quality audio tools.

cta.title: Want to help us grow?
cta.desc: We're constantly adding new tools and improving our engine. If you have suggestions or want to report a bug, we'd love to hear from you.
